entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is mentioned as a character in the conversation between Harry and someone else. She is referred to with a question mark, indicating that she is being asked about or considered.

relationships.description: Harry is considering Mrs Norris and her possible involvement in the flood from Moaning Myrtle's bathroom. This relationship is described as Harry thinking hard about the scene on the night of Halloweâ€™en.
